attributes.review: Donald Trump is a 🎪 do not download this app

This app hacked my phone and replaced all of my pictures with the hashtag #trump2020, that’s all I could see anywhere, my texts, my social media apps. I got this app to see if I should worried about him being president again and I was right! If he is gonna steal my phones data and completely change everything, he is not the right president for us!!! Never has been never will be!!! #Anyoneelse2020
attributes.title: HACKED MY PHONE

attributes.review:
Being the infromed, trumpet adoring republican I am I was appalled by all the negative reviews for this app! I was determined to install the application and expose FAKE NEWS where I saw it! 🇺🇸🇺🇸✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
You can only imagine my horror when the app opened, after a 48 hour wait for the app to load, and demanded an absurd amount of personal information!!!
First it wanted my number (okay.. normal) which I was happy to give and then my state ID (weird??). 
When I stated that I didn’t have one the app demanded I submit a picture of my birth certificate???? I obviously refused because my ‘MERICAN rights to privacy! 😤
But apparently my name sounds, and I QUOTE “suspiciously ethnic”. I tried to reason it out with the support number listed in the app but I think I made it worse...
I NEVER pegged my lord and savior Trump to be a racist but the app immediately signed me out saying I might pose a security threat. I’ve been getting hate texts that same support number ever since??? This has got to be a mistake???  IM PRETTY SURE I AM NOW UNDER ICE SURVEILLANCE.
attributes.title: I. Am. Shocked?!?!??

attributes.review: No matter how much times I opened the app, it would just keep kicking me out. I’ve also experienced multiple glitches on my iPad since installing this app. I haven’t seen any of these glitches before, so I believe that this app is the cause of it. It’s really a shame I was really wanting to support trump and downloaded this app, but it keeps giving me problems. 0/10 would never recommend.
attributes.title: The app would keep kicking me out/ causes glitches?
